rows.label: qst101503_msg0001
rows.name:
This Divine Beast is
still alive, Gramps!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0002
rows.name: Hmm, so it is...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmm, hmm, oh... I see, I see.
You've been through a lot.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0004
rows.name: You can understand it?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0005
rows.name: Just barely.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0006
rows.name:
It seems it was attacked by
monsters and washed ashore here.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0007
rows.name:
The companions it was
with are no longer...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0008
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0009
rows.name:
I wonder if we can take this
Divine Beast to Umon-san's place.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0010
rows.name:
That would be better... It's safer
to pull a ship than to be alone.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0011
rows.name:
Rex, do you remember how
to tame a Divine Beast?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0012
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0013
rows.name: How do you tame a Divine Beast?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0014
rows.name: A Driver controls it

rows.label: qst101503_msg0015
rows.name: Give it a Green Pollen Orb

rows.label: qst101503_msg0016
rows.name: Give it a Mero Mero Melon

rows.label: qst101503_msg0101
rows.name: That's how they do it in Superbia.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0102
rows.name:
Come on, you brought a Divine
Beast to Umon before, didn't you?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0103
rows.name: Oh! The Green Pollen Orb!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0104
rows.name:
That's right, that's right. The
gentle Nopon tradition of taming.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0131
rows.name: That's correct.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0132
rows.name:
Hehe... The traditional
Nopon way of taming, right?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0133
rows.name:
Hmm... A gentler way than that
of Superbia and the like.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0171
rows.name:
...Rex, you just picked it
because of the name, didn't you?

rows.label: qst101503_msg0172
rows.name: I just thought we could get along...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0201
rows.name:
I should still have a
Green Pollen Orb left...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0202
rows.name: Here, eat up.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0203
rows.name: ...'Give me more,' it seems to say.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0204
rows.name:
You're greedy, aren't you...
Here, this is the last one.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0205
rows.name: It seems to have cheered up.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0206
rows.name: Hmm, hmm... Oh, I see!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0207
rows.name: It says it will pull a ship for us.

rows.label: qst101503_msg0208
rows.name: Great!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0209
rows.name: Then, to Umon-san's shipyard...

rows.label: qst101503_msg0210
rows.name:
Was it that thing that
attacked the Divine Beast?!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0211
rows.name:
Did it come back because it
knew it had recovered?!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0212
rows.name: Rex... I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst101503_msg0213
rows.name: Yeah! Let's go!
